title: Android phone DOM
content:
Cleaning up my phone the other day I found some cool stuff. Two years ago I coded some stuff while I was on vacation. This was also on it…

Anyway, here’s a little thing I wrote on a phone to see what the DOM on that phone browser really looked like.

http://test.ronvalstar.nl/DOM/

Types are neatly color coded, objects and functions can fold, and booleans toggled.

Vacation or not, I just can’t go that long without coding anything.
